programme.title: Dr George Gallup (1901 - 1984)
programme.short_synopsis: A profile of George Gallup, the inventor of the Gallup poll.
programme.medium_synopsis: So you think you know how most people feel? Meet Dr George Gallup, the man who transformed our views on what really constitutes public opinion.
